idea:
Auscultation is one of the most primary procedures that most clinicians carry out during initial consultation. There are more than 10 Lakh registered clinicians in the country. Thus, having a high-fidelity alternative of the normal acoustic stethoscopes that they use now means that they can easily detect minute pathological sounds than normal ones that would otherwise require years of training and experience. Better amplification potentially eases the clinicians during training and since the signals are digitally recorded, training becomes easier. Furthermore, as the diagnostic capability of the proposed tool is higher and the skill required to perform the auscultation is lower, the tool empowers nurses to have better diagnostic capabilities. 

The aim of the work is to develop a cost efficient, modular mobile stethoscope that could easily be fit to a wide range of android smartphones. The objectives of the proposal are given below:

Objective 1: To develop high-fidelity prototype of the system

Objective 2: To test the prototype in a clinical setting and acquire feedback on usage and user experience

Objective 3: Modify the device according to the feedback provided by users (clinicians)

Objective 4: Validate the system in a larger number of users (n>200)

The analysis of the signals recorded from the proposed device to predict diseases is not in the scope of this proposal.

The system uses beamforming with multiple sensors to have better amplification without the compromising on noise cancellation. Presently, there is no stethoscope available in the market that uses this feature. The beamforming allows the directional focus to minimize noise right at the sensing end of the device. This feature helps target specific sites for analysis. For example, during auscultation, an examiner may need to physically position the diaphragm of a conventional stethoscope to focus audio recording on the aortic, pulmonic, tricuspid or mitral regions. The beamforming in this device automatically selects the sound direction to be analysed and rejects echo and noise during acquisition itself. This shows a significant improvement in the quality of the sound signals even before processing. Furthermore, the system has a modular design that can be attached to any android smartphone. The system also connects directly with the cloud without needing to connect to a smartphone after initial setup.
name: Nilesh Jain

idea:
TRAFIC (Totally Regulated Access for Infection Control System), is the only fully patented automated hand hygiene washing system that can help manage the hygiene situation for offices, hospitals, clinics, and public environments. This system will help eliminate contamination risk –it is expected to remove more than 99.9% of dangerous pathogens with every 20 seconds to 25 seconds hand wash.

Practicing proper hand hygiene is essential to protecting public health. Healthcare-acquired infections (HAIs) represent nearly every 100 hospitalized patients at any given time, 7 in developed and 10 in developing countries will acquire at least one healthcare-associated infection. One-third of these infections are preventable. Handwashing compliance among healthcare workers is, on average, well below 50 percent. The compliance monitoring is time-consuming, and often inaccurate, and not well implemented, resulting in severe non-compliance. Our automated tracking and compliance monitoring system can be integrated with access control systems, for each staff member it logs each handwashing event, the built-in capability automatically identifies the employee and records and adds the information to the EMR/HIS systems.
name: Nilesh

idea:
Envision offers free personalized student placement services to World leading Universities and Colleges in the UK, USA, Canada, Australia, NZ, Europe, Singapore and The Middle East.


We are currently building teams in Mumbai , Bangalore, Delhi, Pune and Chandigarh. 


Our company’s services will include Career Counseling, International Education Consulting, University & Course Selection, Aptitude Testing, Application Guidance, Visa Guidance, Financial Assistance, Scholarship Information, Pre-departure Support Services and Event Organization.


We believe International Education serves as one of the true game changers in a student’s life and has a significant and compounding effect for many years to come. Envision is committed to empowering students every step of the way.


Our Founding Partner, Priti A Sukhwani is a well-recognized International Education Specialist with rich experience . 


Our vision is to foster the student’s academic as well as social growth and assist every student find their true calling.
name: ENVISION OVERSEAS EDUCATION CONSULTANTS LLP
